description:
This course is not sponsored by or affiliated with Udemy, Inc.

LEARN TO BUILD A WORDPRESS MARKETING MACHINE

Are you a Udemy instructor without a web presence? Do you rely on Udemy to market and sell your Udemy courses? Are you looking to increase your instructor promotion revenues? If so, this course is for you. This course will teach you everything you need to know to create a professional WordPress website to market your Udemy courses and drastically increase your course revenues.

I have increased my course revenues by almost 40% promoting and marketing my Udemy courses on my WordPress website and I'm going to show you how to do so as well!

LEARNING AND CREATING A WORDPRESS WEBSITE IS EASY!

In this course you'll learn everything you need to know to build your WordPress website to effectively market your Udemy courses. I will teach you how to build your website step-by-step from start to finish. Throughout the course, you will follow along as I create a new WordPress website from scratch and show you how to effectively market your Udemy courses by doing the following:

  • Selecting a Professional WordPress Theme
  • Understanding and Implementing SEO in WordPress
  • Creating a Home Page that Converts into Sales
  • Creating and Utilizing Effective Udemy Marketing Images
  • Embedding YouTube Videos for Effective Video Marketing
  • Using Social Media Plugins to Perform Social Media Marketing
  • Creating a Newsletter Emailing List to Build Your Email Marketing List
  • And Much More...

WHAT YOU WILL GET OUT OF THIS COURSE

Once you complete this course, you will have the ability to create a professional WordPress website to drastically increase your Udemy course sales. You will have a full understanding of how to install and manage your new WordPress website. More importantly, you will know how to effectively leverage Internet marketing principles to promote and market your Udemy courses and associated products and services.

SO WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR? JOIN FELLOW UDEMY INSTRUCTORS LEARNING HOW TO CREATE THEIR OWN WORDPRESS WEBSITES & INCREASE COURSE REVENUES!

ENROLL TODAY, YOUR 100% RISK-FREE ENROLLMENT IS BACKED BY UDEMY'S 30-DAY, NO QUESTIONS ASKED, MONEY BACK GUARANTEE!

PREVIEW OVER 1 HOUR OF THIS COURSE THROUGH MY 19 FREE LECTURES, JUST SCROLL DOWN BELOW AND CLICK THE BLUE PREVIEW BUTTONS.
title: WordPress for Udemy Instructors - Unofficial
